meanings.definition: A drink made from lime juice, sugar, and water.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a refreshing glass of limeade on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent2: The picnic basket was filled with sandwiches, chips, and a pitcher of limeade.
meanings.sent3: The limeade decided to take a swim in the ice bucket to cool off.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as bubbly and sweet as a glass of limeade.
meanings.sent5: The tangy taste of limeade lingered on my tongue long after I finished drinking.

meanings.definition: A beverage made from lime juice, sugar, and water.
meanings.sent1: The party guests sipped on limeade while chatting by the pool.
meanings.sent2: In the park, vendors sold hot dogs, popcorn, and chilled limeade.
meanings.sent3: The limeade in the pitcher whispered jokes to the lemonade next to it.
meanings.sent4: The limeade moon hung low in the sky, casting a pale green glow over the city.
meanings.sent5: As the sun set, the sky turned the color of a perfectly mixed glass of limeade.
